meanings.definition: The quality or state of being slim.
meanings.sent1: Her slimnesses made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The model's slimnesses were admired by many.
meanings.sent3: The slimnesses of the pencil made it easy to hold.
meanings.sent4: The slimnesses of the thread made it perfect for delicate sewing.
meanings.sent5: The slimnesses of the tree branches swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The condition of being slender or thin.
meanings.sent1: The slimnesses of the cat allowed it to squeeze through the narrow gap.
meanings.sent2: She envied the slimnesses of her friend's figure.
meanings.sent3: The slimnesses of the wallet made it hard to find in her bag.
meanings.sent4: The slimnesses of the blade made it ideal for precision cutting.
meanings.sent5: The slimnesses of the ice skater's body helped her glide gracefully on the ice.
